page.title: 08HOUSING ESTATE AT HORSHAM
page.content: In{Hills Farm,}a newly developed housing estate on the northern outskirts of Horsham there is a great lack of{amenities.}There are no shops,not even a telephone box or post box,in the whole estate.There are shops in the local village,Broadbridge Heath, which is about 1 mile away and also the town of{Horsham,}which is about the same distance away. The only amenity seems to be a tiny children's playground which consists of{2 swings, {1 slide and 1 roundabout. There are{plans}to build an American football pitch on one of the nearby grassland areas.This would be part of a scheme to produce amenities for the new estate.These are only plans and ideas for the new estate and the whole thing may be abandoned for lack of finance.
